type.description:
## Sneaking

---



[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/sneaking)

Checks whether the entity is currently sneaking.

Type ID: `origins:sneaking`



---

### ğŸ“ Note

__This entity condition type will only work on players.__






---

### Examples

```json
"condition": {
    "type": "origins:sneaking"
}
```
